title: Quick orange and lemon chicken
description: Orange and lemon zest give a zingy flavour to this chicken stir fry, served with garlicky Chinese greens and rice.
ingredients: 450g/1lb boneless chicken breasts, skinned, cut into 2.5cm/1in cubes
1 tsp Shaoxing rice wine (or dry sherry)
enough long-grain rice to fill a measuring jug to 400ml/14fl oz level
750g/1½lb Chinese greens, such as choi sum or bok choi
